title: ( cond ( ( under-the-sun? this ) ( error "doesn't get here" ) ) )
content:
(
  define
  ( on-and-on text )
  (
    define
    been-done
    ( string " has been done already" )
  )
  (
    string-append
    text
    ( on-and-on been-done )
  )
)

(
  display
  (
    on-and-on
    ( string "This" )
  )
)
